nodes.text: Presentation was a month-long festival on the planet of Kesh that occurred during the summer. Among other things, it gave the native Keshiri a chance to gain admission to the Lost Tribe of Sith, a group of Sith stranded on the planet in 5000 BBY. There was also a competition for the Tribe's youth to obtain a uvak, a winged reptilian creature that could be used for transportation. In 37 ABY, Sith Tyro Vestara Khai was one of the children to successfully obtain a uvak.
